Trivia[]

Mordekaiser, the Iron Revenant
  • ▶️  "Enter, and abandon hope!" quotes Dante's Inferno ("Abandon hope all ye who enter here.").
  • ▶️  "Ah, life is a bitter shame" references Crazy Train by Ozzy Osbourne.
  • ▶️  "A fine addition to my domain" could be referencing General Grievous' "A fine addition to my collection."
PROJECT: Mordekaiser
  • In the Latin America and Spain localization, "¡Gestión de Escudo, chico!" ('Shield management, boy!') and "Gestión de Escudo" ('Managing Shield') respectively by using the Indestructible skill with a 5% chance of occurrence, is a wink that correlates with the Spanish-born content creator Manute, who is known for making didactic content and being one of the best Mordekaiser players in his pre-rework.[1] He is known for saying "Gestión de Escudo" when performing an out-play in 1vs1 taking advantage of the mechanics of the champion's shield itself.
Mordekaiser, the Master of Metal
  • ▶️  "Misery loves company" references:
    • The eponymous song by Anthrax
    • The eponymous song by Nirvana
    • My Guitar Lies Bleeding in my Arms by Bon Jovi
    • My Friend of Misery by Metallica
    • Home of the Blues by Johnny Cash
  • ▶️  "No pain, no drain!" references No Pain no Gain by Scorpions.
  • ▶️  "You only need to click once, fool!" is a Meta-reference for in-game movement orders (default: Right Click).
  • ▶️  "So be it... Summoner." references Palpatine from Star Wars ("So be it... Jedi")
  • ▶️  "Time to shred." references the Shred guitar.
  • ▶️  "For great... torment!" resembles ▶️  "For great science!"
  • ▶️   "Mordekaiser... are you also a prisoner?" is a reference to The Prisoner by Iron Maiden, which was also the previous name of the Children of the Grave buff.
  • Mordekaiser shares quotes with:
    • ▶️   ▶️   ▶️   "Misery loves company."
    • ▶️   ▶️   "If I must."
    • ▶️   ▶️   "Carnage!"
